frontmatter.title: Multiscale Modeling and Simulation Approaches to Lipid-Protein Interactions
frontmatter.description: Lipid membranes play a crucial role in living systems by compartmentalizing biological processes and forming a barrier between these processes and the environment. Naturally, a large apparatus of biomolecules is responsible for construction, maintenance, transport, and degradation of these lipid barriers.
